greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=3, a(2)=6, a(3)=3; thereafter a(n) = a(n-a(n-1)) + a(n-1-a(n-2)).
comment: Same recurrence as in A046699 but with different starting values.
link: Nathan Fox, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Nathan Fox, Finding Linear-Recurrent Solutions to Hofstadter-Like Recurrences Using Symbolic Computation, arXiv:1609.06342 [math.NT], 2016.
results.author: _Nathan Fox_, Jul 24 2016
